TopicTitle: Black areas on screen when fly

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone
I have this problem with my ksp2-0.1.2.0
After game loading big black areas appear on view. It seems that the black area is on the sky.
Areas stay fixed if i move views or move the camera. They seems going bigger when more sky area is viewed during view change (with V key) and then they don't turn back. 
Areas are under the game's UI. UI stay visible and work fine.
Areas are visible only during the fly. I never see them in VAB or Map view. I never see them in tutorials.
If during the fly i go to map view areas disappear. When i come back to fly they come back again.
I never seen this in KSP2-0.1.0.0.
In KSP2-0.1.1.0 a similar problem occurred occasionally but i could fix setting all "low" graphic setup and then back to medium. Now this solution don't work anymore.
I tried to remove settings and start with a fresh install but it didn't work.
I tried to change resolution and window size, full screen etc but it didn't work.
I tried to put all graphical settings to low in one by one step but i didn't find anything that make black areas disappear.
Game work great in rest of screen. Changing graphical settings work and i can see changes in the textures, clouds, shadows, etc.

I'm running the game on Windows 11  - 22H2 build 22621.1555 on ARM64.
The machine is a virtualization on Parallels 18 that emulates 4 CPU, 8GB of ram and 4 GB of video memory. 
The real machine is a MacBook with Apple Silicon. 
The game seems to run fine except for this problem.

Does anyone have any suggestion to fix this?
Thank you
